tool.name: SAGA.table_calculus.11
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayFIELDS False isArrayEXTREME_ID False isArrayEXTREME_VALUE False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.table_calculus.11 INPUT $INPUT FIELDS $FIELDS EXTREME_ID $EXTREME_ID EXTREME_VALUE $EXTREME_VALUE TYPE $TYPE IDENTIFY $IDENTIFY prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: Input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELDS
param.label: Attributes
param.help: Attributes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: EXTREME_ID
param.label: Attribute
param.help: Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: EXTREME_VALUE
param.label: Value
param.help: Value The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Identifies from the selected attributes that one, which has the maximum or respectively the minimum value.
